columns.name: OB_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base ship unit.

columns.name: SEQUENCE_NO
columns.description: The sequence number (key) associated to this ship unit attribute.

columns.name: ITEM_FEATURE_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The item feature qualifier GID defining what type of feature this value is associated with.

columns.name: ITEM_FEATURE_VALUE
columns.description: The item feature value for the order base line. This allows for future structural definition of an item such as size and color.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
